div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Exceptional Value
Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Laboratory Specimen Type

title.value: eHDSI Laboratory Specimen Type with exceptions

description.value: This Value Set is used for the kind of material that forms the specimen. It also includes exceptional values
